docs.text: i'm a dedicated fan of writer kevin williamson's work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he always finds a clever way to spice up old material with witty dialogue and fresh ideas that stem from his inventive brain .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with teaching mrs . tingle , his directorial debut , williamson has reached the end of his rope .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: what used to be intelligent about his films is hopelessly stale here .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the components are all there , including an encouraging premise that all high school students can relate to .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but where are the thrills ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the laughs ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: both are supposedly absent from this draggy exercise in elaborate revenge .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and what a shame that is .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i loved the scream films - heck , i even enjoyed the sci-fi goofiness of the faculty .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: kevin williamson was the reason horror films were such a big draw at the box office .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: teaching mrs . tingle , a black comedy that will leave a gaping void in his optimistic followers , may put an end to his reign .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: or perhaps it will encourage him to spend more time perfecting a script than to worry about his directing duties .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i still have my faith , but i fear the name of kevin williamson may soon be a forgotten echo of the past .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the title character of his pet project is a vicious , uncaring history teacher who is played deliciously over-the-top by british actress helen mirren .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: mrs . tingle is basically every student's worst nightmare : a heartless human being bent on distributing poor marks to even the most hard-working of her pupils .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the principal ( michael mckean ) is horrified of her , and she is unanimously despised among her fellow staff members .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i enjoyed the fact that everyone in the hallway quickly steers out of her way .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: mirren's performance is one of the very few delights in this distressingly hollow black comedy that goes down like a flat soft drink .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in other words , it's a poor substitute for williamson's best work .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot is a big problem here .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: material that could have been enjoyable is rendered totally ridiculous by poor handling on the part of the director .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the likable katie holmes plays leigh ann , an over-achiever hoping to get a college scholarship .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but typical mrs . tingle says her history project , which she worked on for countless hours , is laughable .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: later on while studying in the gymnasium , a classmate ( barry watson ) offers her a photo-copied duplicate of mrs . tingle's final exam .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: leigh ann's best friend ( marisa coughlan ) encourages her to use it .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: alas , the old hag herself finds the three scheming , and snatches the test , and prepares to talk to the principal in the morning .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in the morning . . .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: how convenient !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the three students head to mrs . tingle's house , attempting to set the facts straight and clear leigh ann's name .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: things get out of hand , and the teacher gets knocked unconscious in a tussle .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plan is to tie her to a bed and try to get some reasoning out of her .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course , not everything goes entirely to plan .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: besides pointless sub-plots involving the football coach ( jeffrey tambor , horribly wasted ) , there is little by way of actual progress .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there is no urgency to the situation ; little tension or laughs are involved .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the humor is completely inconsistent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: after many of the jokes , the theater was so silent i could have heard a fly sneeze .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you continue to await some momentum in the story , something that could possibly revive the slow pace .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a moment like that never arises .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: williamson also does a handsome job of wasting some of the key supporting players , including the talented mckean and larry sanders' vet tambor .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and the beautiful vivica a . fox has one lifeless scene as a caring guidance counselor , and then williamson disposes of her character entirely .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: on the plus side , holmes and coughlan are admirable ( with the latter giving a frighteningly believable exorcism impression ) , and molly ringwald has an amusing cameo appearance as a substitute teacher .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while everything is pretty lifeless , teaching mrs . tingle remains watchable .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there are a few promising ideas that pop up now and again , but anything remotely interesting is squandered by the inane script .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: mirren is easily the best reason to keep watching .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: she is convincingly evil and fun to watch , but even her gifted delivery can't save individual scenes that flounder in boredom .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if there is one word for the movie surrounding her , it would be `disappointing' .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: basically , kevin williamson is his worst enemy here .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his uneventful direction prevents any aspects of his screenplay to be appreciated ( not that his writing here is especially good ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we will see , when rookie screenwriter ehren kruger writes the third installment in the scream franchise this christmas , whether williamson is for real .
docs.label: negative
